definition: most powerful or important or influential, someone from whom you are descended (but usually more remote than a grandparent)
details:
adjective
- most powerful or important or influential
= example: most powerful or important or influential
= synonyms: dominating
- tending or directed upward
= example: tending or directed upward
= synonyms: ascendent, ascensive
noun
- someone from whom you are descended (but usually more remote than a grandparent)
= synonyms: antecedent
- position or state of being dominant or in control
= example: position or state of being dominant or in control
= synonyms: ascendent
